name: Diona
desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

materials.name: Hoarfrost Core
materials.desc:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.

textualResearch.title: [Of Ballads and Brews] Diona, Fecund Hamper

desc.text:
Clue
Stand at the door of the greatest hunter in Springvale and head to the south! I have hidden my gift on a cliff. If you find it, it's all yours... There's some really good stuff in there!
Message
Hmph, and here I was looking to come and retrieve my gift, but you know what? I guess you're pretty good after all.
Well, this wind chime is yours to keep, but remember: don't drink too much wine — not even if it's Weinlesefest!
If not, the wind chime will ring, and I'll hear it — don't you underestimate the hearing we Kätzlein have! And when I do, you'll be in trouble!
Seriously though, when will they just rename it to the Harvestfest, or the Fruitfest, or something like that...
Item
Shop Ornament: Welcome, Welcome!, 20,000 Mora, Shivada Jade Fragment ×2

Message
"When did Cat's Tail hire such a great bartender? She's not only pretty, but also amazing at her job..."
"But... why would praising her enrage her? I just can't wrap my head around it..."
Cat's Tail's reply
Please don't dwell on the reasons behind it... If you wish to support her, what better way than to come here often?

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Sugary Brew
Diona's outfit. The work uniform of the Cat's Tail's star bartender.

videoCollection.title: New Character Demo - "Diona: Wine Industry Slayer" | Genshin Impact
Version 1.1 "A New Star Approaches" Trailer | Genshin Impact

desc.text: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of <color=#ffd780>Signature Mix</color> end.

Increases <color=#ffd780>Icy Paws</color> ' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the <color=#ffd780>Icy Paws</color> shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Signature Mix</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Within the radius of <color=#ffd780>Signature Mix</color> , Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Icy Paws</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Characters within <color=#ffd780>Signature Mix</color> 's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
· Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
· Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Diona, bartender of the Cat's Tail! I charge a hefty fee for private events. Huh? You didn't come here for a drink? Hmm... Then I accept your invitation... I suppose...

voice.title: Chat: Relax
voice.desc: Ahhh... that stretch feels good.

voice.title: Chat: Thinking
voice.desc: Hmm. Lizard Tail, Pepper, Starconch, hmm... what else do I need to create the most dreadfully disgusting cocktail?

voice.title: Chat: Waiting
voice.desc: I—I wasn't waiting for you. I just happened to be resting!

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Rain! I hate rain! ...Let's go inside... I—I'm not scared of water, I just... hate it when my clothes get wet.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Ahh!!! Uhh, um... I'm not shaking, I'm not... Ohhhh...

voice.title: When It Snows: Playtime
voice.desc: Ooh, it's so cold to touch. Wow, it's so much fun!

voice.title: When It Snows: Viewing
voice.desc: Ooooh, look at the little white snowflakes dancing in the wind, to and fro, and... whew, isn't it... beautiful! C'mon, c'mon c'mon, sit with me... Watch...

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: Come on, let's go bask in the sun a bit~ ...If you aren't coming, I'll just go by myself~ ...Last chance! Are you coming or not!?

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning~ Can you hand me that can of salted loach from the cabinet? Time to destroy the wine industry!

voice.title: Good Afternoon: Strange Noises
voice.desc: Wha— Ugh, no! You heard nothing!

voice.title: Good Afternoon: Canned Food
voice.desc: Uh, I was saving this can of fish for when I was really hungry. Stop looking at it like that! ...Mmm, okay, I'll let you have a little taste, but nothing more!

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Aw, I failed... Ugh, again... Everyone loved my drinks! Gah... Don't try to comfort me. I—I don't need comforting!

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Without cat vision, will you be okay walking home in the dark? If you need me to escort you... What? Th—There's lights? Pff, well who said anything about escorting you? Go on now.

voice.title: About Diona
voice.desc: My ears and tail are no prop, they're real. Proof of my Kätzlein bloodline. It's only weird to you cause you've never seen it before. Wh—Why are you looking at me like that? Fine. You can touch my ears for a second, but the tail is off limits!

voice.title: About Us: Drinks
voice.desc: You want a non-alcoholic drink? No, that's not difficult, but it's meaningless! It doesn't have anything to do with my grand plan of destroying the wine industry of Mondstadt. I won't waste my time on such a drink, hmph!

voice.title: About Us: VIP Channels
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Here! I call this Fantastic Summer-Serendipity Coral Sparkling Tea, I just made it one day when I was bored... Huh, you say it's popular? People are lining up to buy it? Don't be ridiculous.

voice.title: About Us: The Need to Chat
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Well, if you ever feel lonely, you can chat with me. I know lots of cool things~ I'm a good... what's that called... chatting partner! Yes! A good chatting partner, come chat with me... lots... ...okay?

voice.title: About Us: Curiosity
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

What's that!? What's that!? Let me see! Maybe I can add it to my next cocktail to give it a dreadful taste... Huh? It's just a strange-looking mushroom, how boring...

voice.title: About the Vision: Heirloom
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

How did I get my Vision? Simple — everyone in the Kätzlein lineage gets one. ...Huh? Then why doesn't Draff have a Vision? Uhh... Oh no, the cat's out of the bag! Eek!

voice.title: About the Vision: Origin
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Why should I tell you!? Hmph! ...*sigh* Since you won't stop asking... and since we are friends, I'll tell you: One time, my daddy went missing on a hunt in a big storm. All I could think of was finding him, saving him... That's it, are you happy now!

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: Hey, do you think there are any exotic plants on Dragonspine? Maybe something with a deadly bitterness, or something that numbs your mouth upon contact? I'm going to pick a lot! And then... hehehe-hee-hee...

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: When it comes to butterflies, I'm the best at pouncing on— err, catching them. Hey, not in a fun way! I catch butterflies to add a nasty taste to my cocktails. I'm not a cat! Meow! *hiss*

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Diluc... I can't stand him! If there was no Diluc, there would be no Mondstadt wine industry; if there was no Mondstadt wine industry, Daddy wouldn't drink; and if Daddy didn't drink... he would keep me company. Ohhhh...

voice.title: About Kaeya
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

How is it that even a captain is a disgusting boozehound! You know, that guy who's got that laugh! He downs drink after drink. Ugh!

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Venti? I'm not familiar with him... He's a bard? Oh, he must be that guy who sings tunes to entertain the drunkards. Well, then I don't like him, no no no...

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

How come all my fans are drunk middle-aged men, while Barbara's are all young people...? Hmph! So stupid. Forget it!

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius... A rare, mature adult who doesn't drink... But perhaps a little too earnest, cause is it just me, or are the Knights overdoing it a bit on protecting me?

voice.title: About Albedo
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Alchemy genius? Hmm... I wonder if he knows of a way to finally help me make a drink that people don't like?

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Lisa is so nice and gentle! But... how can such a gentle person also be a regular drinker!? Ohhhh... Why!? ...There's really no hope for Mondstadt, is there?

voice.title: About Xiangling
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Xiangling once gave me a "so-awful-it-goes-with-nothing" food combination she came up with, saying how it tasted absolutely terrible, blah blah blah... It didn't work, no use at all. All my little cat ears heard that night was "One more cup of that good stuff!" *sigh*

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Every time Klee wants to play with me, I take her somewhere far from the tavern. Alcohol and explosives... yeah, that's a dangerous combination! I mean, do I want to destroy the wine industry of Mondstadt? Yes, but not in that sense!

voice.title: About Her Father
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I adore my daddy more than anyone else! He's the greatest! But... Daddy after he drinks, ugh... Argh! I must bring an end to the wine industry of Mondstadt, and soon! No time for chit-chat!

voice.title: More About Diona: I
voice.desc: Life as a mixologist is very busy! When I'm not at the tavern, I'm out collecting ingredients for new recipes. So... So unless something is urgent, don't bother me.

voice.title: More About Diona: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

You wouldn't ask me to meow like a cat, like those boozehounds at the tavern do, would you? I wouldn't do it, no way! I'm not some little house pet that just shakes my ears real cute and stretches my back! I'm... I'm Diona, Destroyer of the Wine Industry!

voice.title: More About Diona: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

"How did the Destroyer of the Wine Industry become the Cat's Tail's mascot...?" Y—You're asking this just to make fun of me! Ohhh, you're awful! I won't be giving YOU any more drinks, not even water.

voice.title: More About Diona: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

Don't, don't make me angry. I'm pretty tolerant, but don't even try to mess with me. I'm warning you, I bite when I get angry! Meow!!! ...But maybe I'd let you off easy, no bites...

voice.title: More About Diona: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

You and me... we're good friends now, right? I kind of remember having a friend like this before, but maybe it was a dream... Here, give me your hand. Ahh... Hmm, nice and warm... Very nice... please don't leave me, and become another dream.

voice.title: Diona's Hobbies
voice.desc: I enjoy hunting. I'm especially good at tracking down prey! But Daddy says that the wild is dangerous. One should only go deep into the forest with a reliable adult. ...You're a reliable adult, right?

voice.title: Diona's Troubles
voice.desc: How, oh how can I make awful-tasting drinks...? I had high hopes for the soy sauce, milk, Jueyun Chili, and Dandelion Seed cocktail — my most nightmarish combination to date! But even that was met with praise at the tavern. "This is Little Diona's best drink yet..." Grr! But I won't give up...

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I like, no, LOVE to eat fish! The fish Daddy cooks is the best, a purrfect main course! ...But eating fish as drunk food, that's absolute blasphemy!

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Carrots, potatoes, onions, tomatoes... I don't like the taste of any of those vegetables. ...In fact, I don't eat vegetables at all!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Mmm! I just wanna ask you this... Will you bring more of it next time?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: I'll admit, that was pretty sweet... but that doesn't mean I haven't had sweeter.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Hey... What do you take me for, some sort of stray cat!?

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Here you go — fried fish with my special sauce! ...Relax, I didn't add anything strange! My cooking is actually really good when I want it to be — stop talking and try it already! Hmph... that's better... Oh, and uh, happy birthday.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

A cat's eyes can see even the most elusive prey in the dark.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

A cat's ears can hear even the softest footsteps on the ground.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

A cat's legs can climb even the tallest tree in all of Teyvat.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

A cat's nose can smell those people they are familiar with and like... Ahh!? You're mistaken, how could I say something like that... Ohh...

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Hey-yah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Pew-Pew~!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: On the rocks!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Shaken and stirred!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: V
voice.desc: Scratched ya!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: VI
voice.desc: Think you can bully me?!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Diona Special!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Can't handle your drink? Hmph!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Look at you, boozehound!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Ha, I'm here.

voice.title: Sprint Start: II
voice.desc: Let's go, let's go!

voice.title: Sprint End: I
voice.desc: Phew.

voice.title: Sprint End: II
voice.desc: Phew, hoo.

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: I'm flying!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: If it doesn't ruin a drink, it isn't treasure!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: So glittery... Must... control... urge to pounce...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Potential treasure... *sigh* Alright curiosity, you win again!

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: I won't accept defeat!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Meow...!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: It's not over yet!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Be more careful!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Take a breather!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Bleugh... I smell wine.

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Spring fairy... ugh... Don't leave me...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Can't keep my eyes... open...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Got me that time...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Where'd that come from!?

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: The hunt begins!

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: Huh, need my help as usual?

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Hehe, leave it to me!

value.name: Definitely Not Bar Food!
value.desc: Diona's specialty. The fish skin is crisp, and the meat is sumptuous. Only someone with a sufficiently great love for fish would be able to bring out such lovely flavors. Now, if only there were something to drink to go with it... Uh-oh, she's looking this way!

value.name: Diona
value.desc:
"Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona

1% energy dedicated to mixing drinks, 99% to... denying the reality of familiar.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>November 7, 2020</color>
The incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern, rising star of Mondstadt's wine industry, and the greatest challenger to its traditional powerhouses...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/77944</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 12, 2020</color>
"I charge a hefty fee for private events... huh? You didn't come here for a drink?"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/82224</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2021</color>
Come on over and sit down, this is the place to be!
Hehe... Thanks for your well-wishes. I've got a purr-resent for you too~
Here, an all-new, non-alcoholic special brew. I made it for you personally, you know — so c'mon, bottoms up!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1351016463503486976</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2022</color>
I thought that a birthday break would delay my quest to destroy Mondstadt's alcohol industry...
But I feel good about not having to deal with a nasty alcoholic all day~
There are many flowers I have just picked, and I've made a garland just for you.
It's... it's just a plain old flower garland, nothing too special... J—Just put it on!
Thanks to hou for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1963399</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2022</color>
Four non-alcoholic beverages made from seasonal fresh specialties are required. Please deliver them to the large tree at Windrise by 18:00.
Hmm... Rather strange to be ordering non-alcoholic drinks at a bar... I wonder who its for?
The sun is going down and the special customer of Margaret's who ordered the drinks hasn't arrived yet!
It's cooled down a bit. I hope Diona will like it!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/1963400</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2023</color>
A rare day off. I'll bring these little ones out for some fresh air!
Are you here to get some sun too? One moment, I'll have Finnick make way for you.
No alcohol, no drunkards, and no loudmouthed card players.
Ah... what an amazing birthday!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15106005</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2023</color>
"Boom! Diona, look! Klee blasted lots of fish!"
"Amazing... but don't go overboard! Safety first!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/15106011</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2024</color>
What are you doing here? Not looking for me, are you?
Hmph, no chance! Even if it is my birthday, I won't let anything get in the way of my plans to destroy Mondstadt's alcohol industry!
Huh, you're thinking of heading over to Windrise to catch Crystalflies? But no one's better than me at— I mean, no, no! It's not like I really, really want to go or anything!
B—But seeing as you came all this way, plus we're genuinely running out of Crystal Cores for flavoring drinks, I guess I'll come along anyway...
But just so we're clear... It's me coming along with you, not the other way round! Well don't just stand there then, let's go — time's ticking!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24416481</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2024</color>
"There's sure to be something weird hidden under all that snow that I can mix into my cocktails... Hehehe, Mondstadt's alcohol industry is doomed!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/24416482</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2025</color>
"...Aha! Dipping its feathers in liquor would probably taste awful! Hmm, let's see if I can find any of its fallen feathers around here..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36428016</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 18, 2025</color>
Wah! You startled me! Little kitty, no causing trouble here! This drink's spilled. Guess I'll have to mix another one...
Let me think... Lizard Tails, Slime, Wolfhooks, and maybe a touch of...
Tch, which annoying drunkard ordered a Diona Special: Birthday Edition? W—Wait a second, it was you!?
Hey, hey, you can't drink this one! Let me whip up a new one for you — non-alcoholic, of course!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/36428017</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 14, 2021</color>
Snowmen are cold. Kittens are cute. Festivals make Qiqi happy. Very happy.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/186725</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 5, 2021</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
Balloons flying in the blue sky and carp streamers swimming in the wind decorate the continent of Teyvat.
Let's celebrate by eating Kashiwamochi!
I hope everyone is staying healthy!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1389776869814325249</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 23, 2022</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/12910692</color>

<color=#ffd780>December 25, 2022</color>
"Good job Klee, I'm sure everyone will like it."
Thanks to Cocoon for the fantastic artwork!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/14548853</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 24, 2023</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Portuguese]</color>
"Hmph, there's no one who can beat me at fishing!"
"Bouncing Bomb..."
"Ugh... wait!"
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/BRGenshinImpact/status/1672590439352786945</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 6, 2023</color>
Click image to view full wallpaper
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/22139752</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 30, 2023</color>
"Another glass, Diona~!" "Ugh... Even with all those strange ingredients, you're still not done! I'm struggling to keep up..." "Haha... I know my demands are unreasonable, but play along, would you? I am the birthday boy after all." "*sobs* Even you admit that they're unreasonable!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/23307204</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 27, 2024</color>
"Oz, my familiar..."
"Yes, mein Fräulein?"
"In the name of Verurteilung, on this day of destiny, let us give ourselves to the intoxication beyond this world's bearing, in celebration of the coming of this night!"
"You know as well as I that you are not yet of an age to drink, mein Fräulein."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/29092246</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 25, 2024</color>
"The color looks strange..."
"...!"
"The body of the wine is as delicious as ever, with a subtle balance of sweetness and bitterness, and just the right amount of ice — truly a masterpiece."
"Ugh! I failed again..."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/34487578</color>

<color=#ffd780>August 13, 2023</color>
Neither dwell on your regrets, nor fret over what the future holds.
This melody has witnessed all seasons and climes, settling at last like morning dew in a dream.
Melodies of an Endless Journey will soon resound anew...
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 15, 2024</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
The location of the "Genshin Impact Seven Sacred Summoning Campus Tournament" final viewing party (held on July 12th) has been decided! If you repost a post from [Genshin Impact - Astra Carnival Official X], you may be eligible to enter!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/28635405</color>

The incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern, rising star of Mondstadt's wine industry, and the greatest challenger to its traditional powerhouses.
A feisty feline young lady from Springvale, any drink mixed by Diona's hand tastes delicious beyond belief.
Yet given her extreme distaste for alcohol, is her talent a blessing or a curse?

customize.name: Diluc
customize.desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Diluc</color>
Diluc... I can't stand him! If there was no Diluc, there would be no Mondstadt wine industry; if there was no Mondstadt wine industry, Daddy wouldn't drink; and if Daddy didn't drink... he would keep me company. Ohhhh...
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
Diona's attitude towards me is... how should I put it? Rather rigid. I've yet to find the opportunity to speak with her properly. I'm not sure if it's an issue with my family line or— Oh? It's not? She simply despises alcohol? Huh... I never thought I'd come across another bartender like myself in Mondstadt.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Kaeya</color>
How is it that even a captain is a disgusting boozehound! You know, that guy who's got that laugh! He downs drink after drink. Ugh!
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
Have you tried one of Diona's drinks? Oh right, you're still underage. Haha, such a shame, it truly is — to not be able to revel with you in such bliss. Hehe, I guess all we can do is wait for you to be old enough.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Venti</color>
Venti? I'm not familiar with him... He's a bard? Oh, he must be that guy who sings tunes to entertain the drunkards. Well, then I don't like him, no no no...
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
There's a special drink known far and wide at Cat's Tail. But it ah... ahh... ACHOO! *sniffs* How about you go and fetch one for me? I'll be truly thankful, I promise.

customize.name: Barbara
customize.desc: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Barbara</color>
How come all my fans are drunk middle-aged men, while Barbara's are all young people...? Hmph! So stupid. Forget it!

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Jean</color>
Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius... A rare, mature adult who doesn't drink... But perhaps a little too earnest, cause is it just me, or are the Knights overdoing it a bit on protecting me?

customize.name: Albedo
customize.desc: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Albedo</color>
Alchemy genius? Hmm... I wonder if he knows of a way to finally help me make a drink that people don't like?

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Lisa</color>
Lisa is so nice and gentle! But... how can such a gentle person also be a regular drinker!? Ohhhh... Why!? ...There's really no hope for Mondstadt, is there?

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Xiangling</color>
Xiangling once gave me a "so-awful-it-goes-with-nothing" food combination she came up with, saying how it tasted absolutely terrible, blah blah blah... It didn't work, no use at all. All my little cat ears heard that night was "One more cup of that good stuff!" *sigh*
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
Diona, from Springvale! Ah, I heard she mixes a great drink, so I came specifically to see her! I thought perhaps I could use her secrets in my cooking, and bring out more flavors. But the tips that she gave me — like soaking lizard tails in beer, or putting bits of smoked fish in dandelion wine — all came out really awful. *sigh* Guess it's up to me to work it out myself, then.

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Klee</color>
Every time Klee wants to play with me, I take her somewhere far from the tavern. Alcohol and explosives... yeah, that's a dangerous combination! I mean, do I want to destroy the wine industry of Mondstadt? Yes, but not in that sense!
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
Diona is the best! I like listening to her, last time I heard her say, "I'm gonna destroy the wine industry in this city if it's the last thing I do!" And I'm gonna help her using my bombs! ...I don't know what a wine industry is though. Is it a monster?

customize.name: Draff
customize.desc: Draff Kätzlein is the head hunter for the village of Springvale. He is the father of Diona, a distant descendant of Olaf and part of the Kätzlein Bloodline. While he is a capable hunter and leader, he is also an alcoholic and a known member of the Four Drunkards. He will sell various meats during the day.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Her Father</color>
I adore my daddy more than anyone else! He's the greatest! But... Daddy after he drinks, ugh... Argh! I must bring an end to the wine industry of Mondstadt, and soon! No time for chit-chat!

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

customize.text:
Character Story 2
Character Story 3
Character Story 5
Cold Cocktail Shaker
Vision

customize.name: Eula
customize.desc: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Diona</color>
Diona? She's a miracle worker when it comes to making cocktails, and to my surprise, we get along really well. She infiltrated a tavern with the hopes of tearing down the wine industry, while I infiltrated the knights to exact my revenge on them. A kindred spirit it seems...

desc.text:
Whenever a guest walks into the Cat's Tail, they will immediately glance in the direction of the bar.
Behind it often stands a girl with mildly-twitching cat ears, cocktail shaker in hand, and an unhappy look on her face.
This is the mixologist Diona, ascendant star of Mondstadt's wine industry, and the greatest challenger to its traditional powerhouses.
However, she does not make these wonderful cocktails on purpose — indeed, quite the opposite.
Her mixing methods can seem a little "inscrutable" to an outsider. To herself, Diona tries nothing less than her hardest to ruin that hateful grog.
But no matter the drink, it will turn out to be an unimaginably sumptuous brew so long as it passes through her hands.
This is a "blessing" she has received, though that blessing is a huge headache for her.
For this mixologist proclaims herself to be the "Wine Industry Slayer," and her final objective is the utter destruction of Mondstadt's entire wine industry.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Coming to the Cat's Tail to serve as its bartender was really a prank on Diona's part, the first step in her master plan.
When patrons came in, they would "enjoy" her look of disgust as they got ready for the "Diona Special"...
"Hmph. Here, drink this Sea-Salt Lizard, and kiss your life as an alcoholic goodbye..."
So she would say, thus ruining these boozehounds' appetites.
And yet...
"*glug*... *glug*... Wow, I have never had such a wonderful drink! Can I get a refill, miss?"
"...You want a refill!?"
To this day, Diona has struggled with her unbroken record of mixing fine drinks. Unable to accept defeat, she has yet to give up on her dream of producing something truly disgusting.
However, the results are always the same, and the Cat's Tail remains a popular watering hole, with its pleased patrons singing praises unending of her skill.
All poor Diona can do is puff up her cheeks, tears forming in her eyes as she grumbles:
"Just you all wait!"

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
Diona's father, Draff, is the best hunter in Springvale.
With a resolute face, honed hunting techniques, and calm judgment calls, he fully deserves to be the leader of the huntsmen of Springvale, and is an example to them all.
In Diona's young mind, her father was her shining, perfect idol, the person she wanted to be.
And that was also why she cried her heart out the day the pedestal she had put her father upon abruptly shattered.
"When he's drunk, he's like a wild boar rolling about in the mud!" So she said, her eyes ringed red.
But Diona was not ready to blame this on her father's terrible drinking habits, for how could such a great father have such faults?
"It's the wine's fault! It bewitches people and makes them stupid!"
This is the source of Diona's hatred for alcohol, and the beginning of Cat's Tail's turn in fortunes.
That said, Margaret, the owner of Cat's Tail, had never expected any of this to happen at all. Rather, she had a much simpler reason for hiring Diona.
"What choice did I have? She's just too cute."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Many patrons believed that Diona's feline ears and tail were part of her uniform as a bartender.
This persisted until one day, when one particularly plastered fellow tugged her tail out of curiosity... only to find it unexpectedly warm and soft.
That day, Diona turned the tavern upside-down.
These feline features are the hallmarks of those with Kätzlein blood in their veins, and it is an exceedingly rare sight in Mondstadt.
Other than such aesthetic similarities, Diona and her father Draff also owe their prowess on the hunt to this ancient bloodline.
Infiltration, archery, climbing, and dodging... Diona required no teacher for such skills.
"Ah, yes, and she also has a pair of eyes that can see well in the dark."
"As for weaknesses... She bites when piqued, so please be careful."
Thus did Dr. Edith write of Diona in her notes for "Studies Into Bloodlines Strange and Unfamiliar."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Diona's appearance did indeed have an impact on Mondstadt's alcohol industry.
The Dawn Winery's long-held monopoly was broken overnight by this unexpected ambush from Cat's Tail, and the man put in charge of the winery's business, Elzer, found this unacceptable.
A calculating veteran of many industrial battles, Elzer considered poaching this key figure, never realizing that Diona considered the Dawn Winery a sort of "final boss" to be defeated in her quest.
"This marvelous and bold method of preparation must be the secret of these flavors, yes?"
Diona simply looked at the white-haired man who had just sat down in front of the bar, rank displeasure in her eyes.
"Ah. Simply exquisite. I can just feel your incomparable passion and love for wine."
Diona's hand started to tremble as it held on to her cocktail shaker, and detecting the change at once with his sharp gaze, Elzer understood immediately.
"If a brilliant bartender as yourself were to grace the Dawn Winery with your cooperation, we shall be able to bring Monsdtadt's alcohol industry to heretofore unseen heights!"
...When Diluc questioned Elzer as to the story behind his bandaged hand later, he was uncharacteristically hesitant to say anything.
"I... I was bitten by a cat."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
There is a legend about a "spring fairy" that circulates in Diona's hometown.
The fairy once saved a mother and son who had despaired beside a well, filling the barren hole with rushing waters that pooled and formed a spring. The child, deathly ill, was miraculously healed by those spring waters.
Many people came to catch a glimpse of these blessed waters, and built a settlement around it, and left it not thereafter. Over time, this gave rise to the small town known as Springvale.
Nowadays, few are left who believe that this is any more than a mere legend, and some even dismiss it as myth-making for tourism's sake.
Only little Diona believed in the existence of the spring fairy, and on nights when her father was in a deep stuporous sleep, she would speak to the moon reflected in the spring water's surface.
These were her earnest feelings, innocent and wonderful — feelings worth answering.
That was what the spring fairy believed.
So, Diona would make a curious friend, a companion whom she could bare her feelings to and sometimes assuage her loneliness.
On the night of Diona's seventh birthday, as the moonlight reflected off the spring and upon her face, she heard the soft voice of the spring fairy.
"I will bless you, daughter of hunters, for your days ahead, and as a farewell. May your cup always run over with the sweet wine of celebration. May it always be refreshing as springs of ever-melting snow."
From that day on, the spring fairy would never appear before Diona again, and she left those memories behind, consigning them to her childhood dreams.
Till today, she has yet to realize that her troublesome constitution has anything at all to do with that dream.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Diona's father Draff is also interested in mixing the occasional drink.
Diona's tail would wag from side to side of its own accord as she watched her father rocking the shaker back at forth at night.
But young Diona also found that her father would wind up particularly drunk on such nights, becoming dead to the world before he could even finish her bed-time story.
Thus, when Draff went out to hunt one day, she hid the shaker, squirreling it away in the deepest place under her bed.
Unexpectedly, her father didn't bother looking for the lost shaker at all. He simply brought a new one back the very next day.
When Diona went to Cat's Tail to try out for the role of bartender, Margaret noticed how the cocktail shaker Diona had with her looked wholly unsuited for her style.
Ever skilled with handicraft, Margaret would give Diona a cocktail shaker equipped with a lovely cat's tail as an induction gift.
"Now, this suits you far better," Margaret said with a satisfied nod.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Diona's antipathy towards alcohol is not "hate" per se. Instead, it can be considered a form of "avarice."
She wishes for her father to always be the man that she admires, and she treasures every moment that she spends with her family, unwilling to "share" her happiness with the wine.
There was once a storm that lasted for three days, and for those three days, her father, who had been out hunting, did not return.
The awful weather prevented the search parties sent by the Knights of Favonius from making much headway, and soon the dread of "loss" began to hang over Diona like a shroud.
If she could not even stand to "share," how could she bear having something utterly "stolen" from her?
She burst out the door and into the tempest, and the waters that stood in her path were frozen by some power she did not recognize.
Using her superlative tracking skills, she found her father under a broken gorge.
With the help of the other hunters, she returned home with her father, and only once she realized that he would be fine did she finally smile again.
"Do you... want me to mix you a drink? It'll numb the pain a little..."
That was probably the first time she ever mixed a drink in a normal fashion.
"Ooh, it's so refreshing. It's wonderful! Hahaha—Ouch..."
Getting to drink a cocktail that his daughter had made was probably a better anesthetic by far than the alcohol itself.
Still, Diona gaining power over Cryo did not help reconcile her to wine at all.

<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Freedom
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Shard of a Foul Legacy
materials.desc:
The shard of a weapon that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.
Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents and forms a shield on hit.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.
<color=#ffd780>Tap/Press</color>
Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color>
Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.
The shield has a 250% <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> at the point of formation for a short duration.
When she first started bartending, Diona found that no matter how much ice she put in her cocktails, it would never do a drunkard any harm. That all changed when she received her Vision — now she can form ice cold enough to cause severe brainfreeze. Five out of five stars!

Tosses out a special cold brew that deals <color=#99ffff>AoE Cryo DMG</color> and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.
<color=#ffd780>Drunken Mist</color>
· Deals continuous <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents within the AoE.
· Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.
A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.
Characters shielded by <color=#ffd780>Icy Paws</color> have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.
Opponents who enter the AoE of <color=#ffd780>Signature Mix</color> have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.
When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
